NAME: withdraw
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to withdraw money from your wallet.
OPTION_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: The amount you want to withdraw from your bank account (0 for all).
ALL: You just withdraw all your money from your bank account to your wallet.
NOT_ENOUGH: You owe money to the bank, please deposit some money first.
AMOUNT: You just withdrawn {{amount}}ama from your bank account to your wallet.
